ygData.subject: Re: I'm a guide =D
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to become a guide.  I think you do to become a GM. Greg ... From: Joseph J. Normandin  To:  Sent: Saturday, January
ygData.messageBody:
Not to become a guide. I think you do to become a GM.

Greg
----- Original Message -----
From: Joseph J. Normandin <josephn@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 29, 2000 7:06 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] I'm a guide =D


> From: "Joseph J. Normandin" <josephn@...>
>
> Wow!
>
> I thought one of the requirements was that you needed to live in san
diego!
>
> -joe
> =============================
> Joseph J. Normandin
> josephn@...
> =============================
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Christina Norman" <tina@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
> Sent: Saturday, January 29, 2000 3:27 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] I'm a guide =D
>
>
> > From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
> >
> >
> > Hi Joseph,
> >
> > You don't have to live near Verant to be a guide. You just have to apply
> > and be accepted. I'll let everyone know my guide name when I'm a guide,
I
> > won't give anyone any special treatment. I have to be an apprentice
guide
> > for a while and I can't really do anything but unstuck corpses anyway =)
> >
> > Tina
> >
> > On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Joseph J. Normandin wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Joseph J. Normandin" <josephn@...>
> > >
> > > If you are going ot be a GM on Rodcet you need to learn how to spell
it
> > > first! :) Rodcet Nife <----- heheheh not Rodcet Knife ehhehehe
> > >
> > > Seriously though, that is really cool i wisjh i lived in that area so
i
> culd
> > > be a guide :) if we ahve issues in the game can we contac you
> personally?
> > > or is that a breach of ethics?
> > >
> > > good luck!
> > >
> > > -joe
> > > =============================
> > > Joseph J. Normandin
> > > josephn@...
> > > =============================
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: "Christina Norman" <tina@...>
> > > To: <EQ_Rainbow@onelist.com>

> > >
> > >
> > > > From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > My guide application was accepted, and I've been selected to serve
on
> > > > Rodcet Knife. This was a wondeful surprise for me, as I know a lot
of
> > > people
> > > > on this list play there. I won't be giving any preferential
treatment
> > > > of course, but it will be nice to be able to say hi to you all =)
> > > >
> > > > My training is happening this Saturday, I'm not sure when I'll start
> > > guiding.
> > > >
> > > > - Tina
